name: prototipacao-educa
description: Repositório de prototipação frontend orientado a jornadas com Puck, React e Storybook

scripts.build: pnpm build:tokens && pnpm build:design-system && pnpm build:studio && pnpm build:storybook
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules dist build .next storybook-static
